title: Honor system
body: I've been at level 0 honor for a few months now and IO know it takes forever to get honor back but a few weeks ago I got a notification that said I got level 1 honor so I thought that was cool but when I looked at my profile it still said lvl 0 honor but I didn't think anything of it because sometimes it takes a while to switch but now it's been about 2 weeks and I'm still honor 0 and getting no keys.

replies.body: It's going to take some time to get that honor level back up, and you can slow down if you aren't consistently playing honorably.  For example, I see a match about 2 days ago that might have slowed you down and is a cause for concern.  You'll want to stay consistent here, but you can also hit up our pb team anytime in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for context or guidance.

but what about addressing the fact this player received a message saying honor level 1, yet still displays zero ? is that a bug. 
I've also had the same thing happen to me.
It's possible to return to 0 again if there are future behavioral occurrences.  Any suspension or action taken by the Instant Feedback System can drop you back to 0.

why did it tell me i was at 1 than? I never hit one it just said it
Also why can't riot just say how many honors it takes so I can just get it over with?

Not sure, could be some visual error or misunderstanding.  You haven't been level 1 since October and dropped again after  your most recent set of restrictions.  It's impossible to say how many games or honor it will take you because everyone is different.  Some players are able to recover quickly, and others have games where they cause negative experiences and slow down again. 

I understand that you want to gain your honor level up, but I encourage you to reconsider how you're going about this and reflect more on how you can offer others a more positive experience.
Honor resets after the season starts so I'll just wait until then. Also I've never been level 1 I was level 2 then shot down to 0 and I haven't gotten any higher.
